Regulation Name(s): Instrumentation for clinical multiplex test systems
Respiratory viral panel multiplex nucleic acid assay
Groups A, C and G Beta Hemolytic Streptococcus nucleic acid amplification system
Analyte(s): Streptococcus pyogenes nucleic acid (Group A Streptococcus)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Alere™ i Instrument software modification enabling Alere™ i Influenza A & B and Alere™ i Strep A molecular diagnostic assays using isothermal nucleic acid amplification.
Indications for Use Summary: Alere™ i Influenza A & B: Qualitative detection and discrimination of influenza A and B viral RNA in nasal swabs from symptomatic patients; Alere™ i Strep A: Qualitative detection of Streptococcus pyogenes nucleic acid in throat swabs to aid in diagnosis of Group A Streptococcus infections.
